name: Kayman Solutions
overview:
Kayman Solutions is a specialist IT recruitment agency based in Reading UK.

We differ from other recruitment agencies, whether you are thinking about your next position, or need an effective solution to your resourcing requirements.

Working alongside permanent and temporary candidates from all over the world, Kayman Solutions specialises in uniting top talented candidates with leading technical institutions. Kayman Solutions are proud to be part of a network of recruitment experts who have recently been awarded innovation of the year.

We offer a number of tailored services just for your organisations specialising in finding candidates in all industries. Our market specialization policy is complimented by the fact that Kayman Solutions only employ experienced Recruitment Consultants or consultants that have come from a technical background themselves.

This approach ensures that we are able to very accurately assess the right candidates for the right jobs and vice versa to make sure a lasting impression is made when we successfully place a candidate in a new position.
